Uses of Package
jam.sort

Packages that use jam.sort
jam Root package for the Jam software package. 
jam.sort Classes for controlling the retrieval, sorting and storage of data, including the user-extensible jam.sort.SortRoutine. 
 

Classes in jam.sort used by jam
Controller
          Interface that a class for data taking must implement.
NetDaemon
          NetDeamon receives packets from the network and sends the data data into one or two pipes.
SortDaemon
          The daemon (background thread) which sorts data.
StorageDaemon
          General class to read and write event data streams from/to storage.
 

Classes in jam.sort used by jam.sort
CamacCommands
          Class for storing and sending CNAF commands to the crate controller (which may in fact be the jam process using GPIB in the future).
Controller
          Interface that a class for data taking must implement.
RingBuffer
          RingBuffer is a list of buffers which starts repeating after the last buffer is filled.
SortException
          Exception that is thrown if we have a error in sorting.
SortRoutine
          Abstract class for sort routines which users extend with their own specific code.
StorageDaemon
          General class to read and write event data streams from/to storage.
VME_Channel
          Represents a single channel of data that the acquisition electronics will read out.
VME_Map
          Class for containing a map of the ADC and TDC modules to be addressed, along with channels and thresholds.
